characters.story: The flowers and heavy bend down drooping - the director, supervisor and manager!
"JUNG!" the metal and heavy sing cheerfully - to draw together, concentrate and focus!
"TAN?" the sickness and inflammation question curiously - is this phlegm, mucus and sputum?
"JUNG!" the sickness commands sharply to be correct - the disease, illness and lost soul syndrome!
"TUNG?" the sickness questions curiously - does it hurt, ache and pain?
"YOO!" the sickness commands sharply to get better more and more - to heal the scars!
"YEE!" the sickness commands sharply - an epidemic, plague and outbreak!
"AI?" the sickness questions curiously - is it cancer, a malignant tumor?
"PEE?" the sickness questions curiously - are you fatigued, exhausted and weary?
"JEE?" the sickness questions curiously and rapid, swift and speedy!
"CHIH!" the sickness sings cheerfully - being idiotic, foolish and obsessed!
"LYOH?" the sickness questions curiously about what stays - a tumor, a growth and lump?
"HUN?" the sickness questions curiously - is this a trace, a mark and scar?
The sickness bends down drooping - to itch, scratch and tingle!
"TAN!" the sickness and difficult sing cheerfully despite paralysis - immobilized and disabled!
"CHWAHNG!" the sickness and storehouse sing cheerfully - a sore, a wound and lesion!
The grain bends down drooping - stable, steady and secure!
The pinnacle bends down drooping - hidden, concealed and secret!
